-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A binding to the Xdamage X11 extension library
--   
--   A Haskell binding to the Xdamage X11 extention graphics library.
--   
--   The binding is a direct translation of the C binding; for
--   documentation of these calls, refer to <a>The Xlib Programming
--   Manual</a>, available online at <a>http://tronche.com/gui/x/xlib/</a>.
@package X11-xdamage
@version 0.1.2


module Graphics.X11.Xdamage
type DamageReportLevel = CInt
data DamageNotify
DamageNotify :: CInt -> CUInt -> Bool -> Display -> Drawable -> Damage -> CInt -> Bool -> Time -> Rectangle -> Rectangle -> DamageNotify
xdn_type :: DamageNotify -> CInt
xdn_serial :: DamageNotify -> CUInt
xdn_send_event :: DamageNotify -> Bool
xdn_display :: DamageNotify -> Display
xdn_drawable :: DamageNotify -> Drawable
xdn_damage :: DamageNotify -> Damage
xdn_level :: DamageNotify -> CInt
xdn_more :: DamageNotify -> Bool
xdn_timestamp :: DamageNotify -> Time
xdn_area :: DamageNotify -> Rectangle
xdn_geometry :: DamageNotify -> Rectangle

-- | DAMAGE is a 32 bit value where the top three bits are guaranteed to be
--   0
type Damage = XID
xdamageAdd :: Display -> Drawable -> Region -> IO ()

-- | Creates a damage object to monitor changes to Drawable
xdamageCreate :: Display -> Drawable -> DamageReportLevel -> IO (Damage)

-- | Destroys damage.
xdamageDestroy :: Display -> Damage -> IO ()
xdamageSubtract :: Display -> Damage -> Region -> Region -> IO ()
xdamageQueryExtension :: Display -> IO (Maybe (CInt, CInt))
xdamageQueryVersion :: Display -> IO (Maybe (CInt, CInt))
